extendedInfo.description: Introducing Phase Out, a social rummy-type card game for Android! Based on shanghai rummy, Phase Out features the fun-filled strategic gameplay popularized by other commercial rummy adaptations like Phase 10. Make your way through various stages, satisfying unique requirements for each stage to progress. Be the first player to complete all of their stages to phase out your opponents and become the winner!Features:-Full online play capability with up to 4 players!-Integrate with Facebook or Twitter to play your friends and followers!-Choose from two different preset game modes!Don't forget to rate and comment!------------------------------------------Like us on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/phaseoutgameand follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/#!/phaseoutgame------------------------------------------Use of this game is governed by Phineus Media's Terms of Service:http://phineusmedia.wordpress.com/terms-of-serviceand the Privacy Policy linked below.

reviews.title: LG motion
reviews.comment: Game is simple to play:follow instructions given each phase. Just like Phase 10, except it\'s called Phase Out! Love this game
reviews.author: Tiffany Bunch

reviews.title: Loading....loading..
reviews.comment: When I try to access a game, it continuously displays the loading icon; however, the game does not load. After several minutes it will ask me if I want to force close the game. However when it does work , I love it!
reviews.author: Bobbi H

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: I am experiencing some problems with the app force closing.  When it does work it does not give me my notifications or will not load me current games. Please fix i really love this app. Would be nice also so if it had a nudge notification to let other player know its there turn.
reviews.author: Shannon Alligood

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I really like this app. I just wish you could play more than 2 games at a time. I also wish kindle users could get this game.
reviews.author: RANEE GOOD

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Super. Dono to say in words. I became addict of it. Thank you developers
reviews.author: Ashok Kumar

reviews.title: It does the job for free
reviews.comment: The game is good it just seems that people move too slow.. I would love it if they made a move faster.. but I love the game...
reviews.author: Latoyia Gallimore

reviews.title: Love the game
reviews.comment: My fiance and I love playing this together but when she invites me to play I don\'t receive it and if she calls a rematch my game force closes and I now have to uninstall and reinstall to fix it. Please fix this.
reviews.author: Jess Watterson

reviews.title: Awesome...but...
reviews.comment: This game is awesome...sometimes it freezes and you have to log out and back in but it us fun!! Could use a reset button....just sayin....
reviews.author: J Burrisman

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thank you for updating it. I now get all notifications. Wish you could play more than just 2 games at a time though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game!!
reviews.comment: Lots of fun, waiting for other players is annoying. Would be amazing if there was a nudge feature, and if we could play more than two games at one time. I am still having trouble finding how to send messages to my opponent, although I receive their messages just fine.
reviews.author: Teresa James

reviews.title: Decent but needs a lot of UI improvements
reviews.comment: Allow nudging or time limits to each play so one is not waiting forever for the other player. Allow players to end game w/o penalty if opponent doesn\'t make a move. The submitted cards are hard to read--they should be spread out. Ads in mid-play sux and annoys.
reviews.author: Katharine Park

reviews.title: Issues, but love the game.
reviews.comment: I also have problems with it not wanting to load. The problem I have most with it is it will freeze. It will continually tell me it is the other persons turn when theirs says its mine. I have to uninstall and reinstall to fix it. Other than that, I love this game. It is one of my favorite.
reviews.author: Tonya Irwin

reviews.title: Lots of fun!
reviews.comment: I really enjoy playing this game but there are only two (2) thing that keep me from giving it a five (5) stair rating one (1) the BIGGEST is they changed the land scape and it no longer has the auto rotation. The second is it will NOT always tell you when its your turn. When this happens you have to back all the way out and log back. Thats a pain. Well I guess there\'s three (3) my wife winning lol. No this game is a lot of fun. I hope you enjoy it as much as we do.  Thanks, Brian5856
reviews.author: Brian Hunt

reviews.title: I love the game!
reviews.comment: I love this game! The only small issue I had on my galaxy s3 has been fixed... so as promised I rate it a 5!
reviews.author: Faith Foote

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Good game just wish it didn\'t take other players so long to play, play me Mrs.Davis i play back quickly
reviews.author: Dshawna Hooks

reviews.title: Rate
reviews.comment: Fun game. Just wish you could play more then 2 games at one time
reviews.author: Larry Shearin

reviews.title: Fun to play!
reviews.comment: I\'m a huge phase 10 player and I enjoyed this throughly. It nice to play with my friends online
reviews.author: JJ Giron

reviews.title: Too long to play hands
reviews.comment: Would b better if people didn\'t take too long to play their hands. I have games that last weeks. Those who take too long to play their hands should b automatically disqualified from the game.
reviews.author: Ashley Gary

reviews.title: Loading SUCKS
reviews.comment: It was working awesome before but now it doesn\'t notify me when the other player took their turn. I have to exit out EVERYTHING & then go back in for it to load.
reviews.author: Gaby Garza

reviews.title: only by default
reviews.comment: I am giving 1 star. we should be able t lay more than just 2 games. we should also have an option to end games. I have 2 games sitting there I can\'t play because these people don\'t play. pointless.if not fixed soon will delete if it is fixed I am willing to better rate
reviews.author: Joselyn Justiniano
